title: £50 P/W ROOM IN NORTH LONDON
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Hi, I have a nice single room to share with another tenant. This room is nice tidy in a 2 bedroom house. You will pay £50 and I will pay £50 every week.

You can move in short term or long term. 

Fast wifi 
No deposit required
Must be clean and tidy 
Smoking allowed 
Netflix 24/7
All bills inclusive 
Washing machine on site 

It will suit a working female or student that can keep the place clean and tidy.

Fast wifi, Train station, shops, pubs, bars restaurants Tesco bustop all within 3 mins walk.

WhatsApp me on 07741474069 to move in. Michael
